Posted By: DlCK (3/22/2010 7:15:12 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
For my elf deck, I can see this guy protected with [Whispersilk Cloak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Whispersilk Cloak), so not only could I use [Joraga Warcaller](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Joraga Warcaller) and/or [Strength of the Tajuru](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Strength of the Tajuru), but he'd also be protected from removal AND could quickly become strong enough to kill someone with 1 attack since the Cloak also grants unblockability. So either I threaten them with an elven army with 'roids aided also by [Quest For Renewal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Quest For Renewal) and [Overrun](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Overrun) or 1 huge creature made purely out of mana, which btw I think it's flavor txt and everything else is very consistent with the name ans etc.
  
   
We all know that it can be removed or something pretty easy, but I think ppl forget that can happen to anything, even that nasty [Progenitus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Progenitus)...but that's the only creature I know that is nearly impossible to actually and totally do away with..... but I enjoy killing ppl with that Hydra anyway ;) the only defense anyone put up against... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

So either I threaten them with an elven army with 'roids aided also by Quest For Renewal and Overrun or 1 huge creature made purely out of mana, which btw I think it's flavor txt and everything else is very consistent with the name ans etc.

We all know that it can be removed or something pretty easy, but I think ppl forget that can happen to anything, even that nasty Progenitus...but that's the only creature I know that is nearly impossible to actually and totally do away with..... but I enjoy killing ppl with that Hydra anyway ;) the only defense anyone put up against... posts.post_content: i use this in a mono green mana acceleration elf deck. [Elvish Herder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elvish Herder) is his best friend in that deck. thought maybe [Priest of Titania](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Priest of Titania) or [Elvish Archdruid](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elvish Archdruid) could fight for that title. i use elf token generaters to create swarms of elves and then get a 40/40 trampler along with like 10 3/3s (1/1 elves pumped by the archdruid or [Imperious Perfect](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Imperious Perfect)) all of this by turn five
